cardsMechanics

Class AbstractCard

  • java.lang.Object
    • cardsMechanics.AbstractCard
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Card
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Assassin, Druid, Healer, Hunter, Knight, Mage, Paladin, Shaman, Warlock

    public abstract class AbstractCard
extends java.lang.Object
implements Card
    the abstract class of the implementation of the Card interface, it compiles various methods common of the specific card types.
    Author:
    T Ismael Verdugo
    See Also:
    Card, Assassin, Druid, Healer, Hunter, Knight, Mage, Paladin, Shaman, Warlock

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AbstractCard(java.lang.String name)
      Constructor to make cards, it receives the name of the card, and the rest of the fields are initialized with the method setCardDefault setCardDefault().

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void actOn(Card card)
      Makes this card interact on the card passed as parameter.
      void actOnAssasin(Assassin assassin)
      makes this card act on the assassin type of card.
      void actOnDruid(Druid druid)
      makes this card act on the druid type of card.
      void actOnHealer(Healer healer)
      makes this card act on the healer type of card.

      makes this card act on the hunter type of card.

      makes this card act on the knight type of card.

      makes this card act on the mage type of card.

      makes this card act on the paladin type of card.

      makes this card act on the shaman type of card.
      void actOnWarlock(Warlock warlock)
      makes this card act on the warlock type of card.
      void attackOn(Card card, double Effectiveness)
      makes the damage counter of the parameter card go up in a value equal to the attack points of this card by the multiplier effectiveness. the total value to be added to the damage counter is done by calling the damageBy method Card.damagedBy(double amount) on the objective parameter card.
      void damagedBy(double d)
      makes this card to augment his damage counter by the parameter d, where the damage counter only keep integer values, but the parameter d is double.
      void defaultAction(Card card)
      Set the default action of this card made over the parameter card.
      void depoweredBy(double d)
      makes this card to decrement his attack points by the parameter d, where the attack points only keep integer values, but the parameter d is double.
      void depowerOn(Card card, double Effectiveness)
      makes the attack points of the parameter card go down in a value equal to the attack points of this card by the multiplier effectiveness. the total value to be rested to the attack points is done by calling the depoweredBy method Card.depoweredBy(double amount) on the objective parameter card.
      void empoweredBy(double d)
      makes this card to augment his attack points by the parameter d, where the attack points only keep integer values, but the parameter d is double.
      void empowerOn(Card card, double Effectiveness)
      makes the attack points of the parameter card go up in a value equal to the attack points of this card by the multiplier effectiveness. the total value to be added to the attack points is done by calling the empoweredBy method Card.empoweredBy(double amount) on the objective parameter card.
      int getAttackPoints()
      Return an integer object that is the attack points of the card.

      Return an integer object that is the amount of damage of the card.

      Return an integer object that is the amount of health of the card.

      Return a String object that is the corresponding name of the card.

      Return a String object that is the name of the type of the card.

      makes this card to decrement his damage counter by the parameter d, where the damage counter only keep integer values, but the parameter d is double.
      void healOn(Card card, double Effectiveness)
      makes the damage counter of the parameter card go down in a value equal to the attack points of this card by the multiplier effectiveness. the total value to be rested to the damage counter is done by calling the healedBy method Card.healedBy(double amount) on the objective parameter card.
      boolean isOutOfCombat()
      Return a boolean representation of the ability of this card to perform actions.
      void setCard(int lifePoints, int attackPoints, int damageCounter)
      Set the values of the fields of the card by the parameters given to it
      void setCardDefault()
      method that set the fields of the card to their defaults values. life points equal to 100, attack points equal to 12, and damage counter equal to 0.

      • isOutOfCombat

        public boolean isOutOfCombat()
        Description copied from interface: Card
        Return a boolean representation of the ability of this card to perform actions. is true when it cannot commit more actions. it becomes true when the damage counter of the card is equal to the life points of the card.
        Specified by:
        isOutOfCombat in interface Card
        Returns:
        a boolean that says if this card cannot perform actions

      • actOn

        public void actOn(Card card)
        Description copied from interface: Card
        Makes this card interact on the card passed as parameter.

        this method is used to make a dispatch to the method actOnMe of the other card.

        Specified by:
        actOn in interface Card
        Parameters:
        card - the card in which the action resolves

      • defaultAction

        public void defaultAction(Card card)
        Set the default action of this card made over the parameter card. The default behavior of the method is to call the attackOn method, with an effectiveness of one but some types of card override it, so it changes from type to type (of card). It's usage is to set a default action from an implementation of a card thus all calls of actOn(), and explicitly, in actOn-CardType() use this method to perform a default behavior. It's meant to be used with a combination of the attackOn(), healOn(), empowerOn() and depowerOn() methods
        Parameters:
        card - the card on which the action is resolve
        See Also:
        attackOn(Card, double), healOn(Card, double), empowerOn(Card, double), depowerOn(Card, double)

      • attackOn

        public void attackOn(Card card,
                     double Effectiveness)
        makes the damage counter of the parameter card go up in a value equal to the attack points of this card by the multiplier effectiveness. the total value to be added to the damage counter is done by calling the damageBy method Card.damagedBy(double amount) on the objective parameter card.

        the maximum value to the damage counter is equal to the life points of the card.

        Parameters:
        card - the card on which the attack is resolve
        Effectiveness - the multiplier of the attack action

      • healOn

        public void healOn(Card card,
                   double Effectiveness)
        makes the damage counter of the parameter card go down in a value equal to the attack points of this card by the multiplier effectiveness. the total value to be rested to the damage counter is done by calling the healedBy method Card.healedBy(double amount) on the objective parameter card.

        the minimum value to the damage counter is equal to the 0.

        Parameters:
        card - the card on which the heal is resolve
        Effectiveness - the multiplier of the attack action

      • empowerOn

        public void empowerOn(Card card,
                      double Effectiveness)
        makes the attack points of the parameter card go up in a value equal to the attack points of this card by the multiplier effectiveness. the total value to be added to the attack points is done by calling the empoweredBy method Card.empoweredBy(double amount) on the objective parameter card.

        there is no maximum value to the attack points.

        Parameters:
        card - the card on which the empower is resolve
        Effectiveness - the multiplier of the attack action

      • depowerOn

        public void depowerOn(Card card,
                      double Effectiveness)
        makes the attack points of the parameter card go down in a value equal to the attack points of this card by the multiplier effectiveness. the total value to be rested to the attack points is done by calling the depoweredBy method Card.depoweredBy(double amount) on the objective parameter card.

        the minimum value to the attack points is equal to the 0.

        Parameters:
        card - the card on which the empower is resolve
        Effectiveness - the multiplier of the attack action

      • damagedBy

        public void damagedBy(double d)
        Description copied from interface: Card
        makes this card to augment his damage counter by the parameter d, where the damage counter only keep integer values, but the parameter d is double.

        the maximum limit of the damage counter is equal to the value of the life points of this card, if more damage where be taken by this card, is ignored.

        Specified by:
        damagedBy in interface Card
        Parameters:
        d - the amount of damage points added to the damage counter

      • healedBy

        public void healedBy(double d)
        Description copied from interface: Card
        makes this card to decrement his damage counter by the parameter d, where the damage counter only keep integer values, but the parameter d is double.

        the minimum limit of the damage counter is equal to 0, if more heal where be taken by this card, is ignored.

        when this card is out of combat (damage counter is equal to the life points), then it cannot be healed, thus the heal is ignored.

        Specified by:
        healedBy in interface Card
        Parameters:
        d - the amount of damage points rested to the damage counter

      • empoweredBy

        public void empoweredBy(double d)
        Description copied from interface: Card
        makes this card to augment his attack points by the parameter d, where the attack points only keep integer values, but the parameter d is double.

        there is no maximum limit to this value.

        Specified by:
        empoweredBy in interface Card
        Parameters:
        d - the amount of attack points added to the damage counter

      • depoweredBy

        public void depoweredBy(double d)
        Description copied from interface: Card
        makes this card to decrement his attack points by the parameter d, where the attack points only keep integer values, but the parameter d is double.

        the minimum limit of the attack points is equal to 0, if more depower where be taken by this card, is ignored.

        Specified by:
        depoweredBy in interface Card
        Parameters:
        d - the amount of attack points rested to the damage counter
